text: Maria Angeles Calderon Gonzalez (born October 27, 1974 in Madrid) is a goalball player from Spain. She is blind and is a type B2 goalball player. She works for ONCE selling coupons. She played goalball at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. Her team was second. == References == Category:Spanish goalball players Category:Living people Category:1974 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Madrid Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2
title: María Ángeles Calderón González
